summary: Choclolate color scheme, based on the W3C core style
name: chocolate.vim
description:
"Choclolate", a dark colorscheme based on the W3C core style of the same name and 'clean.vim' by Ron Aaron.

See http://www.w3.org/StyleSheets/Core/Overview

Sample:

http://happy.cat/blog/VIM-Chocolate-Colorscheme-2008-06-04-16-30.html
install_details:
Linux / UNIX:  drop this file in $HOME/.vim/colors
Windows: place in $HOME\vimfiles\colors
:colorscheme chocolate
